trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定的標準端點<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract base class without a public or protected constructor and is not intended for developers to extend.
trans-unit.target: 這是沒有公用或受保護的建構函式的抽象基底類別，並不適用於開發人員擴充。

trans-unit.source: It is the base class for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint> classes.
trans-unit.target: 它是基底類別<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint>類別。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebServiceEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper"></xref>聯<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebServiceEndpoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Web content type mapper.
trans-unit.target: Web 內容的型別對應器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether cross domain script access is enabled for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebServiceEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否跨網域指令碼啟用存取權。 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebServiceEndpoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cross domain script access is enabled, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果跨網域指令碼存取已啟用，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching the URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出主機名稱是否會用來比對 URI 時取用服務。

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出主機名稱是否會用來比對 URI 時取用服務。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode"></xref>, which ignores the hostname in the match.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode"> </xref>，其中忽略主機名稱比對。

trans-unit.source: The value set is not a valid <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值不是有效<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*>值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints that use this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定最大的緩衝區管理員會管理使用此繫結之端點所需的緩衝區配置的記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager> tries to minimize the cost of using buffers with a buffer pool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager>嘗試利用緩衝集區將使用緩衝區的成本降至最低。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager>

trans-unit.source: Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 他們從通道送出時，訊息處理服務將需要緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager> must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead.
trans-unit.target: 如果在處理訊息負載，讓緩衝集區中沒有足夠的記憶體<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager>必須額外的記憶體從 CLR 堆積配置，這樣會增加記憶體回收負荷。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager>

trans-unit.source: Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A> limit.
trans-unit.target: 廣泛從 CLR 記憶體回收堆積所配置的緩衝區集區大小太小，而效能可以改善較大的配置，藉由增加<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A>限制。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in bytes, for the pool of buffers used by an endpoint configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組為單位，此繫結設定之端點所使用的緩衝集區的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 65,536 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory that is allocated for use by the manager of the message buffers that receive messages from the channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定配置供從通道接收訊息，訊息緩衝區管理員的記憶體的最大數量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager> minimizes the cost of using buffers by using a buffer pool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager>利用緩衝區集區將使用緩衝區的成本降至最低。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager>

trans-unit.source: Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 他們從通道送出時，訊息處理服務將需要緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager> must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead.
trans-unit.target: 如果在處理訊息負載，讓緩衝集區中沒有足夠的記憶體<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager>必須額外的記憶體從 CLR 堆積配置，這樣會增加記憶體回收負荷。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BufferManager>

trans-unit.source: Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A> limit.
trans-unit.target: 廣泛從 CLR 記憶體回收堆積所配置的緩衝區集區大小太小，且效能可以改善較大的配置，藉由增加<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A>限制。</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of memory, in bytes, available for use by the message buffer manager.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組為單位，可供訊息緩衝區管理員使用的記憶體數量上限。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 524,288 (0x80000) bytes.
The value set is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值是小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size for a message that can be processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以由繫結處理的訊息大小上限。

trans-unit.source: The size of the messages that can be received on the wire by services using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> is bounded by the amount of memory allocated for each message.
trans-unit.target: 可以在網路所使用的服務接收的訊息大小<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>會受限於配置給各訊息的記憶體數量。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: This bound on message size is intended to limit exposure to denial of service (DoS) attacks.
trans-unit.target: 這項關於訊息大小旨在限制暴露於阻絕服務 (DoS) 攻擊。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 大小上限，以位元組為單位，繫結所處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 65,536 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 值小於零。

trans-unit.source: A message exceeded the maximum size allocated.
trans-unit.target: 訊息超過已配置的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可由以此繫結設定的端點處理的 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束。

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.
trans-unit.target: 複雜性條件約束會防止阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊會嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的類別。

trans-unit.source: The properties that express these constraints and their default values (in bytes) are as follows: - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A> = 32 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A> = 8192 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A> = 16384 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A> = 4096 - <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A> = 16384
trans-unit.target: 表示這些條件約束及其預設值 （以位元組為單位） 的屬性如下:- <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A>= 32- <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A>= 8192- <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A>= 16384 位<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A>= 4096 位<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A>= 16384</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints.
trans-unit.target: 複雜性條件約束。

trans-unit.source: The value set is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The quota values of <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas> are read only.
trans-unit.target: 配額值<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas>都唯讀的。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas>

trans-unit.source: The quotas set must be positive.
trans-unit.target: 設定的配額必須是正數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the security settings used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此繫結的安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: To use a non-default type of security, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用之安全性的非預設類型，使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>建構函式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set this property to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> and you are using HTTP, be aware that credentials are sent over the wire in plain text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您將此屬性設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>而且您使用 HTTP，請注意憑證會以純文字方式透過網路傳送。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"></xref> that is used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"> </xref>搭配此繫結使用。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed or buffered (or both) modes of message transfer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出以繫結設定的服務是否使用資料流或緩衝 （或兩者） 的訊息傳輸模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode> indicates whether a channel uses streamed or buffered modes for the transfer of messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>指出通道是否使用訊息傳輸的資料流或緩衝模式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode> value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed or buffered (or both) modes of message transfer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>值，指出以繫結會使用資料流或緩衝處理是否設定的服務 （或兩者） 的訊息傳輸模式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>

trans-unit.source: The value set is not a valid <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值不是有效<xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransferMode>

trans-unit.source: Gets the of the Web service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Web 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The type of Web service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務端點的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character encoding that is used for the message text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於訊息文字的字元編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The character encoding that is used.
trans-unit.target: 已使用的字元編碼。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>.</xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The value set is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
